cardseteditor

Class EditorDOM

  • java.lang.Object
    • cardseteditor.EditorDOM

  • public class EditorDOM
extends Object
    This class implements the editor document object model, and it provides routines for reading and writing card sets from and to files.
    Since:
    5.0
    Version:
    5.1
    Author:
    David E. Reese

      • writeCardSet

        public void writeCardSet(String theFileName,
                EditableCardSet theCardSet)
                  throws Exception
        This method outputs a given card set to a given file.
        Parameters:
        theFileName - File to which the cardset is to be written.
        theCardSet - Cardset to write.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown if an error is detected by a called routine.

        theCardSet - Card set to print.

      • readCardSet

        public EditableCardSet readCardSet(String theFileName)
                            throws Exception
        This method reads the card set file for the editor.
        Parameters:
        theFileName - Name of file to read.
        Returns:
        Structure containing the editable information about the card set.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown if the structure of the file is incorrect.
